body_en: Sanctions have been imposed since 2014, due to the occupation of Crimea and support for separatists in the DNR and LNR. They were introduced in several phases. And in 2022, in the context of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine, these sanctions have now [grown significantly](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_sanctions_during_the_2022_Russian_invasion_of_Ukraine).
